update banner set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_url = #{bannerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from banner where is_show = 1 order by `order`
